data.headline: Passionate UX Designer with a Self-Taught Background
data.summary: As a self-taught UX Designer, I have a unique perspective and a deep passion for creating intuitive and user-centric digital experiences. With a strong background in front-end development, I bring a well-rounded skill set to the table, allowing me to bridge the gap between design and implementation. My attention to detail, problem-solving abilities, and collaborative nature have been instrumental in delivering successful projects for a range of clients. I am constantly seeking new challenges to expand my knowledge and push the boundaries of what's possible in the world of user experience.

experience.title: UX Designer
bullets: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for a variety of web and mobile applications.
Conducted user research, including interviews, usability testing, and data analysis, to gain insights that informed the design process.
Created high-fidelity prototypes and interactive mockups to effectively communicate design concepts and gather feedback from stakeholders.
Participated in agile development sprints, ensuring seamless integration of design solutions with the engineering team.

experience.title: UX Design Consultant
bullets: Provided UX design services to early-stage startups, helping them develop user-friendly products and improve their digital experiences.
Conducted user research, created wireframes, and designed high-fidelity prototypes to validate design concepts with target users.
Collaborated closely with founders and engineering teams to ensure design solutions were technically feasible and aligned with business objectives.
Mentored junior designers and shared best practices in user-centered design methodologies.

projects.name: Fitness Tracker App
projects.description: Designed and developed a mobile app that helps users track their fitness activities, set goals, and monitor their progress.

projects.name: E-commerce Website Redesign
projects.description: Conducted a comprehensive UX audit and redesigned the user interface and information architecture of an existing e-commerce website to improve conversion rates and customer satisfaction.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Maximilian Müller, a mid-career UX Designer with a self-taught background, is shown in a well-lit, neutral setting, wearing a collared shirt and looking directly at the camera with a friendly expression.
